mdRecord.dcterms:title: Attachment Box for the Sears "Minnesota" sewing Machine
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Attachment Box for the Sears "Minnesota" sewing Machine filled with a variety of small attachments to modify the stitch the sewing machine can make.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sewing--Equipment and supplies
Sewing machines
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
